content: As another poster pointed out, if 25% of blacks have no ID to vote with, voting is the least of their problems. Without an ID, they can’t get a job, can’t open a bank account, can’t get an apartment, and can’t pick up a prescription. How do you advance yourself without an ID? Rather than making it easier to vote without ID, wouldn’t it benefit them more in the long run to actually have an ID? Why not endeavor to get IDs for everyone?
